entry.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use 1.1

link.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use 1.1

entry.content:
main changes:
- Just a little changes in terms of use, makes it look more formal.

Data I collect:

Home page > no log

Searx > no log

Data I share:

(in fact, I have nothing to share now)

I won’t sell your data forever.

Only in one situation, I may share the data with governments or others. You broke the terms of use heavily, and I work with them can prohibit injuries that haven’t occurred. There must be enough reason to believe their request is sincerely and necessary.

I’ll make these requests public. (I haven’t gotten yet)

Terms of use:

Do not hurt anyone for malicious intent.

That’s all.

Please understand, ZhaoCloud values your data and tries our best to protect your privacy. But in case of attacking, spying and intimidating, I can’t make any promise!
entry.summary: main changes: - Just a little changes in terms of use, makes it look more formal.

entry.title: Chinese Homepage Offline | 中文主頁下綫

link.title: Chinese Homepage Offline | 中文主頁下綫

entry.content:
抱歉，我放弃了维护中文主頁

(translation: Sorry, I gave up maintaining Chinese home page)

靜態存檔 | achieve(in Chinese)

《！中文首頁已停止更新，將於6月30日下線！》

《原主頁》
entry.summary: 抱歉，我放弃了维护中文主頁

entry.title: Server Provider Changing
entry.content:
I’m changing ZhaoCloud’s servers provider to Microsoft’s Azure. (Before is Digitalocean)

All of my services will down for a while.(GMT 12:30-13:00)

All sub projects are affected.

Thanks for your cooperation.
entry.summary: I’m changing ZhaoCloud’s servers provider to Microsoft’s Azure. (Before is Digitalocean)

entry.title: Old Homepage Cookies
entry.content:
The new homepage is no-cookie.

Browsers maybe show the ‘last used’ time is current, or ‘cookies in use’. But they weren’t really being used.

You can remove my old cookies. Then I think they won’t appear.

entry.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use 1.0

link.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use 1.0

entry.content:
main changes:
- corrected misspelled words and grammar mistakes
- new log policy
- more specific rules of working with governments

Data I collect:

Home page > no log

Searx > no log

Data I share:

(in fact, I have nothing to share now)

I won’t sell your data forever.

Only in one situation, I may share the data with governments or others. You broke the terms of use heavily, and I work with them can prohibit injuries that haven’t occurred. There’s enough reason to believe their request is sincerely and necessary.

I’ll make these requests public. (I haven’t gotten yet)

Terms of use:

Do not hurt human, furry, other animals or living things, for malicious intent.

That’s all.

Please understand, ZhaoCloud values your data and tries my best to protect your privacy. But in case of attacking, spying and intimidating, I can’t make any promise!
entry.summary: main changes: - corrected misspelled words and grammar mistakes - new log policy - more specific rules of working with governments

entry.title: Searx updating at 2021-06-13
entry.content:
I’ll update Searx from 2021-06-13 4:35(UTC) to 2021-06-13 4:55(UTC). The service will offline for a while. Go to searx.space use another instance please.

I know Morty proxy down again. I’ll also fix it today.

Ipv6 will be avaliable after this update.
entry.summary: I’ll update Searx from 2021-06-13 4:35(UTC) to 2021-06-13 4:55(UTC). The service will offline for a while. Go to searx.space use another instance please.

entry.title: Update 2021-06-10 (homepage)
entry.content:
from Worldpress to Jekyll:

  • no more google font
  • no more canvas
  • hard to attack
  • save costs
  • no more Plesk, no more log. I can manage Caddy server by my self

‘Contact’ is in ‘About’ page now. I wrote a new ‘about’ page too!

The beautiful theme is calls ‘leaf’, by Supun Kavinda. I did some little edits on it. Ex: removed Google Analytics.

Hope you like it!

entry.title: Update 2021-5-19 (for Searx)
entry.content:
Searx :

Rebuilt by Docker.

Bugs Fixed:

  • Wrong redirect

Changes:

  • I no longer use Cloudflare CDN on this. (if your traffic still pass Cloudflare, refresh your DNS cache please)

New Functions:

  • Morty result proxy
entry.summary: Searx : Rebuilt by Docker. Bugs Fixed: Wrong redirect Changes: I no longer use Cloudflare CDN on this. (if your traffic still pass Cloudflare, refresh your DNS cache please) New Functions: Morty result proxy

entry.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use (BETA)

link.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use (BETA)

entry.content:
Data I correct:

Home page > logs can't be connected to person

(This is the default setting of the software running on the server. I'm planning to fix it later)

Searx > no log

Data I share:

I won't sell your data forever.

Only in these situations I may share the data with governments or others. You broke the terms of use and I work with them can prohibit injuries that didn't occur. There's enough reason to believe their request is sincere and necessary.

Teams of use:

Do not hurt humans or other living things with malicious intent.

That's all.

Please understand, ZhaoCloud values your data and tries our best to protect your privacy. But in case of hackers attack, spy and intimidate, I can't make any promise!

I'm planning to fix it later) Searx > no log Data I share: I won't sell your data forever. Only in these situations I may share the data with governments or others. You broke the terms of use and I work with them can prohibit injuries that didn't occur. There's enough reason to believe their request is sincere and necessary. Teams of use: Do not hurt humans or other living things with malicious intent. That's all. Please understand, ZhaoCloud values your data and tries our best to protect your privacy. But in case of hackers attack, spy and intimidate, I can't make any promise!
